content: Dodge or deflect if you can't move fast enough, and be ready for his boar form to reappear dazed and winded from the phase. This is your big opportunity to hit him with all the focus points you've stored up, as well as any powerful Spirit Attacks you can unleash.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Lower Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Fight - Zhu Bajie (Second Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
Dodge or deflect if you can't move fast enough, and be ready for his boar form to reappear dazed and winded from the phase. This is your big opportunity to hit him with all the focus points you've stored up, as well as any powerful Spirit Attacks you can unleash.
